exclusion.criterion: pump, metal implants or clips in field of view
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: systemic inflammatory disorder (e.g, rheumatoid arthritis, periarteritis nodosa, systemic lupus erythromatosus, temporal arteritis)
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery, which may require surgical intervention. He also has a family history of CAD.
